description: In a desolate desert landscape featuring prominent cacti, one vulture lies incapacitated, partially dissolving into abstract dots and lines, having apparently collided with an unseen force. A second vulture hovers nearby, exhibiting a look of exasperation and dripping from its beak, seemingly reacting to the other's plight. The absurd situation involves a physical impact resulting from pursuing a non-physical optical illusion, highlighting the surreal consequences of mistaking reality for deception.
caption: "You moron! ... I told you it was only a mirage!"
